feed.title: Upcoming network event: block v2 lock-in

entry.title: Upcoming network event: block v2 lock-in
entry.summary: In an email conversation between two individuals, Luke-Jr stated that bitcoind was not involved in the implementation of the miner end of BIP 34. However, Jeff Garzik disagreed with this statement, explaining that bitcoind's 'getblocktemplate' RPC call is used by some and supplies the block version, selects transactions for the miner, and performs other tasks necessary to the implementation of the miner and BIP 34.
